titles.title: Urging the United States to lead the world back from the brink of nuclear war and halt and reverse the nuclear arms race.
Urging the United States to lead the world back from the brink of nuclear war and halt and reverse the nuclear arms race.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
